Title: AFRICAN TRANSFORMATION: Media sustainability in the Global South: GIBS partners with Daily Maverick to launch Executive Programme in Media Leadership
Description: The global media landscape is grappling with a deepening crisis as traditional media business models struggle to keep up with digital innovation. But those situated in the Global South face compounded challenges, including market failures, infrastructure deficits and fragile democracies — making it increasingly difficult for media outlets to remain independent. In response to these challenges, the Gordon Institute of Business Science partnered with Daily Maverick to launch its inaugural Executive Programme in Media Leadership: Strengthening Media Leaders in Africa on 15 April 2025.
